name: friends (bruncket)
description:
friends, as it is currently known as, is a project ive been working on off and on for about 2 years, its a fairly simple game with a large idea and world behind it. this short demo will give a look into some of the worlds creatures and setting, or at least what seems like it. stumble through the story, if you can, and pick up some friends along the way, or brute strength it on your own. sometimes people dont want friends. sometimes people dont want to be friends.

it takes about an hour to beat, depending on what path you decide to take

note, this is in no way a "finished" game, its basically a demo of a demo, im still cleaning some things up and adding more
